message: Bob, I propose we split the money 60/40. It's a fair deal that lets us both benefit before inflation significantly impacts the value.
Alice, I think we can both do better. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, as I'm the one taking the bigger hit from inflation. Let's get this done before the value of our money drops further.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  My offer is more than fair considering the inflation is hitting you harder. Let's be reasonable and end this here.
